title: The F1 records set to fall as McLaren marches to 2025 constructors' title
summary: McLaren's dominant 2025 season could rewrite Formula 1's record books. These are the benchmarks that the team can break before the end of the year

qa_pairs.question: What is the constructors' championship in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: An annual competition that awards points to teams based on the performance of their drivers in races.
wrong_options: A competition for individual drivers only.
A trophy awarded for the fastest lap in each race.
A championship for the best pit stop team.

qa_pairs.question: Which team is predicted to dominate the 2025 Formula 1 season?
What might McLaren's potential dominance in 2025 lead to?
wrong_options: An increase in the number of race weekends.
The introduction of new technical regulations.
A change in the scoring system for drivers.
